title: Containerize MVP runner with pinned dependencies
scope: Create a container build for the MVP runner suitable for GCP batch execution.
Pin dependencies to avoid drift and record versions in diagnostics.
Support GPU and CPU variants (build-time or run-time selection).
acceptance: A Dockerfile exists that builds the runner image deterministically.
The container can run a smoke command and print tool versions (ffmpeg/ffprobe/python).
Image does not bake machine-specific paths; configuration is passed via env/job spec.

deliverables.title: Runner container build artifacts
acceptance: Dockerfile builds successfully with pinned deps.
README documents how to build and run the image locally.

subtasks.title: Add Dockerfile and local build/run docs.
done_when: Container can execute the runner entrypoint in a smoke mode.
